created.description: __Read-only__ The date this StackScript was created.

deployments_active.description: __Read-only__ Count of currently active, deployed Linodes created from this StackScript.

deployments_total.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ The total number of times this StackScript has been deployed.

id.description: __Read-only__ The unique ID of this StackScript.

images.description:
An array of Image IDs. These are the Images that can be deployed with this StackScript.

`any/all` indicates that all available Images, including private Images, are accepted.

is_public.description: __Filterable__ This determines whether other users can use your StackScript. __Once a StackScript is made public, it cannot be made private.__

label.description: __Filterable__ The StackScript's label is for display purposes only.

mine.description: __Filterable__, __Read-only__ Returns `true` if this StackScript is owned by the account of the user making the request, and the user making the request is unrestricted or has access to this StackScript.

rev_note.description: __Filterable__ This field allows you to add notes for the set of revisions made to this StackScript.

script.description: The script to execute when provisioning a new Linode with this StackScript.

updated.description: __Read-only__ The date this StackScript was last updated.

user_defined_fields.description: __Read-only__ This is a list of fields defined with a special syntax inside this StackScript that allow for supplying customized parameters during deployment. See [Declare User-Defined Fields (UDFs)](https://www.linode.com/docs/products/tools/stackscripts/guides/write-a-custom-script/#declare-user-defined-fields-udfs) for more information.

items.description: A custom field defined by the User with a special syntax within a StackScript. Derived from the contents of the script.

default.description: __Read-only__ The default value.  If not specified, this value will be used.

example.description: __Read-only__ An example value for the field.

label.description: __Read-only__ A human-readable label for the field that will serve as the input prompt for entering the value during deployment.

manyOf.description: __Read-only__ A list of acceptable values for the field in any quantity, combination or order.

oneOf.description: __Read-only__ A list of acceptable single values for the field.

user_gravatar_id.description: __Read-only__ The Gravatar ID for the User who created the StackScript.

username.description: __Read-only__ The User who created the StackScript.
